attributes.action: Global Community to address mankind's worst disaster materialising at Fukushima.
attributes.background: Fukushima Nuclear Plant was devastated by a quake in 2011 & is still leaking into the Pacific after 6yrs. Over 1,000 towers have been filled with toxic water on site, another quake will collapse the towers & the remaining reactors, radiation x14,000 stronger than the Hiroshima bomb will be released.

rejection.details: This petition calls on the global community to take action. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
